data.text:
Heritage Images Photo Prints and Wall Art

Weeping Man, 1850 / 59. Creator: Adolph Menzel

Weeping Man, 1850/59. Heritage Images features heritage image collections. Â© Heritage Art/Heritage Images

Media ID 24369205

Framed Prints

Experience the profound emotion of Adolph Menzel's timeless masterpiece, "Weeping Man (1850/59)" with a Media Storehouse Framed Print. Captured by Heritage Images, this exquisite artwork showcases the German painter's exceptional talent in portraying human emotion. The intricately detailed painting of an older man, lost in deep sorrow, is a poignant reminder of the power of art to evoke feelings and tell stories. Bring this moving piece into your home and let it inspire reflection and introspection. Each Media Storehouse Framed Print is meticulously crafted with museum-quality materials and comes ready to hang, ensuring a stunning presentation of your new artwork acquisition.

Photo Prints

Experience the profound emotion of Adolph Menzel's masterpiece, "Weeping Man, 1850/59," now available as a stunning photographic print from Media Storehouse. This exquisite image, captured from Heritage Images, showcases the intricate details and rich colors of Menzel's original painting. Bring the depth and intensity of this 19th-century masterpiece into your home or office, and let its haunting beauty evoke a deep sense of introspection and emotion.

Poster Prints

Experience the profound emotion of Adolph Menzel's masterpiece, "Weeping Man, 1850/59," now available as a stunning poster print from Media Storehouse. This captivating work of art, created by the renowned German painter Adolph Menzel, depicts a deeply introspective man in a moment of profound sadness. The intricate details and rich colors of this iconic image come alive in our high-quality poster prints, making it an excellent addition to any home or office space. Bring a touch of history and artistry into your surroundings with this beautiful and thought-provoking poster print from Heritage Images and Media Storehouse.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Discover the captivating world of art with Media Storehouse's Jigsaw Puzzle featuring the poignant masterpiece, "Weeping Man, 1850/59" by renowned German painter Adolph Menzel. This intricately detailed puzzle brings the depth and emotion of Menzel's iconic painting to life. Recreate the haunting image of the weeping man in this captivating jigsaw puzzle and immerse yourself in the rich history and artistic excellence of this timeless piece. Perfect for art enthusiasts, puzzle collectors, or anyone seeking a challenging and rewarding activity, this jigsaw puzzle is a must-have addition to your collection.
